title: Honda moped stolen from retail park in Thetford
content:
The black moped with green rims, registration P171 PGV, was taken from Forest Retail Park between 6am and 2.10pm today, Wednesday September 2.

Anyone who may have seen anything suspicious between the times stated or anyone with information should contact PC Matt Hendry at Thetford Police Station on 101 or call Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555111.
